name: pieui
description: A React component library featuring PieCard component

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --minify
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --format cjs --target node --minify
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
